content.text:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer

message.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows a brightly lit room that appears to be a breakfast or dining area. The walls are a warm golden-yellow color. There are three framed floral paintings (depicting lilies) hanging on the wall. Several small tables are set for one or two people, each with a white tablecloth, plates, cutlery, and cups/glasses. There are chairs with yellow upholstery around the tables. A large floral arrangement in a glass vase sits on a small table in the foreground, filled

content.text:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a brightly lit room that appears to be a breakfast or dining area. The walls are a warm golden-yellow color. There are three framed floral paintings (depicting lilies) hanging on the wall. Several small tables are set for one or two people, each with a white tablecloth, plates, cutlery, and cups/glasses. There are chairs with yellow upholstery around the tables. A large floral arrangement in a glass vase sits on a small table in the foreground, filled.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['north', 'east']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}

message.content: QUESTION: Are there any floral paintings (specifically depicting lilies) visible in the image? Also, are there tables set with plates, cutlery, and cups/glasses?

content.text: question: are there any floral paintings (specifically depicting lilies) visible in the image? also, are there tables set with plates, cutlery, and cups/glasses?

message.content: ANSWER: Yes, there are floral paintings depicting lilies visible in the image – there are three of them hanging on the wall. And yes, there are tables set with plates, cutlery, and cups/glasses.
